Name: id
Description: An identifier variable that uniquely identifies each response

Name: submission_date
Description: Date when the respondent submitted the survey

Name: gender_individual
Description: Gender of respondent

Name: age_individual
Description: Age of respondent

Name: education_level_individual
Description: Education level of respondent

Name: years_of_experience_individual
Description: Years of experience of respondent

Name: permanent_district_individual
Description: Permanent district of residence of the respondent.

Name: temporary_district_individual
Description: Temporary district of residence of the respondent.

Name: occpatn_shopkeeper_pre_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the main occupation of the respondent was "shopkeeper" before COVID-19 in the tourism sector.

Name: occpatn_tour_guide_pre_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the main occupation of the respondent was "tour guide" before COVID-19 in the tourism sector.

Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the main occupation of the respondent was "mountain guide" before COVID-19 in the tourism sector.

Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the main occupation of the respondent was "driver" before COVID-19 in the tourism sector.

Name: occpatn_travel_agent_pre_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the main occupation of the respondent was "travel agent" before COVID-19 in the tourism sector.

Name: occpatn_flight_attendent_pre_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the main occupation of the respondent was "flight attendant" before COVID-19 in the tourism sector.

Name: occpatn_pilot_pre_covid

Name: occpatn_waiter_pre_covid

Name: occpatn_bartender_pre_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the main occupation of the respondent was "bartender" before COVID-19 in the tourism sector.

Name: occpatn_porter_pre_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the main occupation of the respondent was "porter" before COVID-19 in the tourism sector.

Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent had any other main occupation before COVID-19 in the tourism sector.

Name: had_frml_employment_contract_pre_covid
Description: Did you have a formal employment contract with your employer while working in the tourism sector before COVID-19?

Name: had_pan_pre_covid
Description: Did you have a PAN(Personal Account Number) number before COVID-19?

Name: wrk_type_seasonal_pre_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent employment type was "seasonal work".

Name: wrk_type_daily_wages_pre_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent employment type was "daily wages".

Name: wrk_type_monthly_salary_pre_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent employment type was "monthly salary".

Name: other_wrk_type_pre_covid
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent employment was any other type.

Name: sesonal_work_period
Description: On average, how many months (in a year) did you used to work in the tourism sector?

Name: trsm_major_work_district
Description: Text variable that contains name of districts where respondent does major tourism work.

Name: have_alternative_income_source
Description: Do you or your family have an alternative source of income other than tourism?

Name: alternate_income_source_agriculture_animal_husbandry
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent has "agriculture and animal husbandry" as alternative source of income.

Name: alternate_income_source_daily_wages
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent has "daily wages" as alternative source of income.

Name: alternate_income_source_business_occupation
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent has "business / occupation" as alternative source of income.

Name: alternate_income_source_job_estate
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent has "job / estate" as alternative source of income.

Name: alternate_income_source_professional_work
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent has "professional work (journalist, lawyer, consultant, contractor, priest, etc.)" as alternative source of income.

Name: other_alternate_income_source
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent has "any other" alternative source of income.

Name: self_savings_chng_today_v_19
Description: Compared to the end of 2019, how much savings do you have now?

Name: had_land_assets_pre_covid

Name: has_outstanding_debt

Description: How many family members, including yourself, depend on your income after COVID-19?

Description: How many of your family membersâ€™ basic needs can be met by your current income?

Name: is_vaccinated_against_covid
Description: Have you been vaccinated against COVID-19?

Name: has_received_covid_hhs_training
Description: Have you received any health and safety training related to COVID-19?

Name: received_hhs_training_from_goverment
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent received health and safety training from "Government".

Name: received_hhs_training_from_ngo
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent received health and safety training from "NGO".

Name: received_hhs_training_from_employer
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent received health and safety training from "Employer".

Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent received health and safety training from "Hotel / workers associations".

Description: Flag variable that indicates whether respondent received health and safety training from "any other sources".

Name: learned_new_skills_during_pandemic
